property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, you may put a non-evolution Light creature that has "blocker" from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HYPERIFY} Tap one of your other creatures. (During your main step, you may unleash Hyper Mode. Hyper Mode stays until the start of your next turn.) ---- {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent can't choose this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature taps, one of your other creatures gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Attack Chance: Creature in Hyper Mode (When one of your creatures that has unleashed Hyper Mode attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then put a creature that costs 4 or less from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may have more than 4 of this card in your deck. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ After this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, search your deck. You may take a Hachiko, Loyal Sword of Bukkomi from your deck and put it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ At the end of each of your turns, put the top 13 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {VIVIDDRAW} {WF2|spell} (During your turn, when you draw this creature before you attack, you may reveal it. If you do, you may pay Water/Fire 2 | s p e l l to summon this creature this turn.) ■ Discard a card from your hand. Then draw 3 cards.
